葪字的基本解释

葪
jì
古同“蓟”。
割。

葪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《玉篇》古麗切］
同“薊1”。
(1)草名。
(2)木名。参见“葪柏”。
[②]［jiè］
［《字彙》古拜切］
同“芥1”。

葪字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1045第33
【玉篇】同薊。　又【篇海】割也。　又木名。【山海經】葪柏，狀如荆，白華而赤實，服者不寒。　又通芥。【史記·賈生傳】細故?葪兮。【註】?葪，鯁刺也。

葪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
葪字的起名意思

暂无。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
jì
The ancient same "thistle".
Cut.
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Jade Pian" Gu Liqie]
Same as "Thistle 1".
(1) Cursive name.
(2) Wooden name. See "Pin Bai".
[②]［jiè］
["Words" Gubaiqie]
Same as "Mustard 1".
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　葪; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1045 Page 33
【Jade articles】Same as thistle.　[Pianhai] Cut too.　Also wooden name. 【Shan Hai Jing】Pin cypress, like a jingle, is white and red, and the person who wears it is not cold.　Through the mustard again. [Historical Records · Biography of Jia Sheng] A detailed story? Feng Xi. [Note]? Feng, thorns are also.
